description: You can use AWS::Organizations::Account to manage accounts in organization.

AccountName.description: The friendly name of the member account.
AccountName.markdownDescription:
The friendly name of the member account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: [\u0020-\u007E]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Email.description: The email address of the owner to assign to the new member account.
Email.markdownDescription:
The email address of the owner to assign to the new member account.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 6  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleName.description: The name of an IAM role that AWS Organizations automatically preconfigures in the new member account. Default name is OrganizationAccountAccessRole if not specified.
RoleName.markdownDescription:
The name of an IAM role that AWS Organizations automatically preconfigures in the new member account. Default name is OrganizationAccountAccessRole if not specified.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [\w+=,.@-]{1,64}  
Update requires: No interruption

ParentIds.description: List of parent nodes for the member account. Currently only one parent at a time is supported. Default is root.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(r-[0-9a-z]{4,32})|(ou-[0-9a-z]{4,32}-[a-z0-9]{8,32})$  
Update requires: No interruption

ParentIds.markdownDescription:
List of parent nodes for the member account. Currently only one parent at a time is supported. Default is root.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A list of tags that you want to attach to the newly created account. For each tag in the list, you must specify both a tag key and a value.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of tags that you want to attach to the newly created account. For each tag in the list, you must specify both a tag key and a value.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A custom key-value pair associated with a resource within your organization.

Key.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.
Value.markdownDescription:
The string value that's associated with the key of the tag. You can set the value of a tag to an empty string, but you can't set the value of a tag to null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A custom key-value pair associated with a resource within your organization.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AccountId.description: If the account was created successfully, the unique identifier (ID) of the new account.
AccountId.markdownDescription:
If the account was created successfully, the unique identifier (ID) of the new account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws.*:organizations::\d{12}:account\/o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}\/\d{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

JoinedMethod.description: The method by which the account joined the organization.
JoinedMethod.markdownDescription:
The method by which the account joined the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: INVITED | CREATED  
Update requires: No interruption

JoinedTimestamp.description: The date the account became a part of the organization.
JoinedTimestamp.markdownDescription:
The date the account became a part of the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the account in the organization.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the account in the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | SUSPENDED | PENDING_CLOSURE  
Update requires: No interruption
